casebody.data:
No. 10-1317. Miles Christi Religious Order, et al., Petitioners v. Township of Northville, Michigan, et al. 564 U.S. 1039, 131 S. Ct. 3071,

180 L. Ed. 2d 889,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 4989. June 27, 2011.

Petition for writ of cer-tiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Sixth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 629 F.3d 533.
